projects.title: Smarter Quotation Management
projects.summary: Automating tuna sales quotations with real-time insights and faster deal cycles
problem: Manual quotation processes creating delays and inefficiencies
Limited visibility into quote status and performance metrics
Slow approval workflows impacting deal closure rates
approach: Built digital platform automating quotation lifecycle from draft to approval
Developed interactive dashboard with real-time sales performance metrics
Implemented automated alerts for pending approvals and expiring quotes

kpis.label: Response Time
kpis.description: Faster quote generation and approval cycles

kpis.label: Conversion Rate
kpis.description: Higher quote-to-deal conversion through better insights

projects.detailedDescription:
SQS Project – Streamlining Tuna Sales Quotation Management

A digital platform designed to transform how seafood companies manage their sales quotations. The system automates the entire process — from draft to approval — offering real-time visibility, faster decision-making, and improved accuracy.

An interactive dashboard gives sales teams a clear picture of performance through key metrics such as:
• Quotes pending approval and those expiring soon (today / this week)
• Pricing insights by fish type and size (e.g., Skipjack 3, Yellowfin 6)
• Approved, expired, and draft quotes in the last month
• Quote volume and conversion rate trends
• Average response time and quote value
• Rejection and pending quote rates
• Overall closure efficiency

By combining automation with intuitive data visualization, the platform empowers commercial teams to act faster, reduce manual workload, and increase conversion rates.

Impact: more efficient workflows, faster approvals, and smarter pricing decisions backed by real-time data.

projects.title: ASO Project – AI for Smarter App Store Optimization
projects.summary: Boosting mobile app visibility with intelligent keyword generation and real-time performance tracking
problem: ASO Project – Intelligent Optimization for App Growth
A digital solution designed for a global mobile marketing company to enhance App Store Optimization (ASO) strategies.
The platform leverages AI to automatically generate and prioritize keywords, helping mobile apps achieve higher rankings and visibility across Apple and Google stores.
It enables data-driven decisions that improve user acquisition efficiency and boost organic growth.
approach: An interactive dashboard consolidates app performance data and key ASO metrics in real time, including:
Total downloads and conversion rate
Average user rating
Error tracking and apps flagged as at risk
Total impressions by app and store
Keyword performance and ranking evolution
Through AI-driven keyword generation and real-time KPI monitoring, marketing teams can optimize campaigns continuously and focus on high-impact actions.
outcomes: By automating keyword discovery and performance analysis, the platform reduces manual work, speeds up optimization cycles, and enhances visibility across app stores.
The result: more efficient ASO strategies, improved conversion rates, and sustainable app growth powered by intelligent automation.

projects.title: AI Chatbot for Boutique Hospitality
projects.summary: Transforming guest communication in the Riviera Maya with a smart, multilingual digital concierge
problem: A proof-of-concept project developed for a boutique hotel group in the Riviera Maya.
The goal was to explore how conversational AI can enhance guest engagement, streamline communication, and support personalized booking experiences in the luxury hospitality segment.
The initiative focused on creating a natural, human-like assistant to provide guests with fast and tailored responses — anytime, anywhere.
approach: The AI-powered chatbot integrates with hotel management systems to manage real-time guest interactions, including:
Room availability and booking assistance
Check-in / check-out support
Local recommendations and experiences
Concierge and special requests
Built as a proof of concept, the chatbot uses AI-driven natural language processing and multilingual support to deliver seamless communication across web, mobile, and messaging channels.
outcomes: The solution demonstrated how conversational technology can reduce response times, automate repetitive tasks, and improve guest satisfaction.
It paved the way for 24/7 digital concierge services, helping boutique hotels offer a more connected, personalized, and efficient guest experience.

projects.title: AI Chatbot for University Campuses
projects.summary: Improving student support and engagement with a smart conversational assistant
problem: A proof-of-concept initiative exploring how conversational AI can simplify student interactions on university campuses.
The project aimed to enhance accessibility to information, automate administrative inquiries, and improve the overall student experience through instant, human-like communication.
The focus was on supporting both prospective and current students with timely, accurate responses across multiple channels.
approach: The AI-driven campus assistant was designed to handle common student and faculty inquiries, including:
Admission and enrollment information
Course schedules and exam dates
Campus navigation and facilities
Administrative procedures and deadlines
General FAQs and contact routing

Using natural language understanding and multilingual support, the chatbot delivers relevant answers in real time — accessible via web and mobile platforms, fully integrated with existing university systems.
outcomes: The project showcased how AI can reduce administrative workload and improve communication efficiency across departments.
It laid the foundation for 24/7 digital student support, enabling universities to provide faster, more consistent, and more personalized experiences at scale.

projects.title: Grafana-Based Monitoring Platform
projects.summary: Centralized visibility, proactive alerting, and complete observability across infrastructure
problem: A comprehensive monitoring initiative designed to establish end-to-end visibility across development and production environments.
The goal was to create a unified observability platform that could track system performance, application health, and security metrics in real time.
The focus was on proactive monitoring, automated alerting, and seamless integration with existing DevOps workflows.
approach: A Grafana-based observability platform integrating best-in-class open-source tools:
Prometheus for metrics collection and real-time performance tracking
Mimir for scalable, long-term metric storage
Loki for log aggregation and correlation
Alertmanager for orchestration of automated notifications

Metrics were gathered across DEV and PROD from multiple layers — system resources (Node Exporter), databases (PostgreSQL Exporter), applications (Node.js custom metrics, PM2), and security tools (Fail2Ban, CSF).
Dynamic dashboards provided unified insights into infrastructure, application health, and database performance.
The platform also featured:
Slack-integrated alerting
Threshold-based monitoring (CPU, memory, disk)
Integrated performance testing with k6
Security via NGINX reverse proxy, SSL, credential rotation, and IP whitelisting.
outcomes: The new observability layer delivered end-to-end visibility, enhanced operational resilience, and faster incident response.
It reduced downtime, simplified troubleshooting, and established a scalable foundation for future monitoring and DevOps automation initiatives.
